cause.description:
To raise awareness and funds to promote the knowledge of genocides, and means to prevent and stop them from happening.
1. Genocide must be ended.
2. Teens must be educated about the past and present of genocides.
3. Education and knowledge are the keys to preventing such a tragedy.
cause.mission: Raise awareness and funds to support and educate teens about past and ongoing genocides.
cause.name: Teens for Genocide Awareness
